 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָסַר‎</span>] **verb** si vera lectio ==deliver up, offer== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָסַר‎</span>; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***deliver up, denounce, betray***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְסַר‎</span>; [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>ZMG xivi. 1892, 530</sup> compare Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מסר‎</span> ***take away***); — 

**Qal** ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִמְסָרמַֿ֫עַל בי‎</span> [[Num.31.16|Num 31:16]] ***offer*** (commit) ***a trespass against*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִמְעֹל‎</span>, compare [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] (see [[Num.5.6|Num 5:6]]; [[2Chr.36.14|2Chr 36:14]]). **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּמָּֽסְרוּ‎</span> [[Num.31.5|Num 31:5]] ***delivered over to, assigned to*** (of warriors), read perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּסָּֽפְרוּ‎</span> ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]. <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἐξηρίθμησαν</span>) compare [[BDB#Thes|Thes]]. 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹסֵרוֺת‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָסֹ֫רֶת‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אסר‎</span>. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹסָר‎</span>] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוּסָר‎</span> below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יסר‎</span>.
